strings.Value: "Tell me about the Rushlight tournament."
"What events are on the schedule?"
"I'm ready to participate in the fisher's triathlon."
"I'm ready to participate in the boasting contest."
"I'm ready to participate in the drunken melee."
"Farewell."
[Leave the tournament] "I'm leaving."
"I've changed my mind. I'll stay."
"Yes, I must leave immediately. Farewell."
"The tournament is finished, isn't it? I'd like to know who won."

"Your Royal Highness, welcome to the Rushlight tournament! My name is Nunzio Arpaia, and I have the honor of being His Highness King Irovetti's master of ceremonies. You could say the organization of this tournament rests on my shoulders. If you need anything, I'm at your disposal!"
"What can I do for you?"

"The tournament consists of three contests. First, the participants will display their strength and dexterity in the fisher's triathlon, a tribute to local crafts and trades, so to speak. Then we'll be measuring competitors' wits in the boasting contest — there's a reason we're the cultural capital of the region, after all! And finally, the evening will wrap up with some mock combat in the drunken melee. Then His Magesty will announce the winner of the tournament, and we'll all enjoy a festive banquet followed by a splendid fireworks show!"
"Let's begin!"
"Everyone's ready — let's begin!"
"Then let's begin — it will be splendid!"
"I'm always at your service."

"Since starting his reign over {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}, His Highness King Irovetti has held this tournament once in several years, inviting guests from the high society of nearby kingdoms to attend. Today, we have guests from Daggermark, {g|Mivon}Mivon{/g}, Gralton, and Tymon. Unfortunately, {g|Brevoy}Brevoy{/g} did not honor us with their representatives this year — it's entirely possible that recent events and the stressful political climate have put them in a less than festive mood. But we're pleased to have Your Highness in attendance for the first — and I hope not the last — time this year!"
"Already? But the tournament hasn't concluded yet! You haven't had the chance to see our fireworks display!"
"You're too kind, Your Highness."
"Such a pity! Well... perhaps next year. Have a safe journey!"
"Yes, His Highness is just about to make a speech announcing the winner! Look, everyone's gathering around now!"
"And what about flyting? I'm good at that!"
"Flyting was likely canceled due to my arrival, I suspect. More's the pity — I lost the chance to earn myself a second death sentence!"
